column2: "EWURADZE n'asɛm baa Jeremia nkyɛn a otsia ebien
column3: ber a ɔda ho da efiadze wɔ ɔweɔmfo abangua mu hɔ no
column7: EWURADZE a ɔhyehyɛ ma otsim hɔ no; ne dzin dze EWURADZE no

column4: na makyerɛ wo ndzɛmba akɛse a ɔyɛ yɛ na a ɔwo innyim."
ɔse wɔ kurow yi mu adan
column5: na Juda ahemfo adan a mpempe na afona ntsi woedwuruw egu famu no ho nye yi:"

column3: na mbom wɔdze nyimpa a mekuku hɔn wɔ m'ebufuw na m'ebufuhyew mu
column4: na osian hɔn emumuyɛ nyinara ntsi ma medze m'enyim ehuntsa efi kurow yi ho no

column3: emi mara mebɛbrɛ no apɔwmudzen na edur
column4: na masa hɔn yarba; na meyi asomdwee na nokwar pii makyerɛ hɔn."

column2: "Na mebɛma Juda ndɔmmum na Israel asan aba
column3: na medze hɔn mesi hɔ dɛ asɔpɔn no."

column2: "Na mebɛtsew hɔn ho efi hɔn emumuyɛ nyina a wɔdze ayɛ bɔn etsia me no ho; na medze hɔn emumuyɛ nyina a wɔdze ayɛ bɔn etsia me no
column3: na wɔdze afom me no mefir hɔn."

column2: "Na kurow yi bɛdan me ahosɛpɛw dzin
column3: ayɛyi na enyimnyam wɔ asaase do amanaman nyina a wɔbɛtse yie a medze reyɛ hɔn no nyina enyim
column4: na woesuro na hɔn ho apopo wɔ yie nyina na asomdwee nyina a mirinya mama hɔn no ntsi."

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi: Bea yi a hom ka wɔ ho dɛ
column4: nyimpa na abowa biara nnyi hɔ
column7: nyimpa na tsefo na abowa biara nnyi mu no

column3: na ayeforkun ndze na ayefor ndze
column5: ber a wɔdze ndaase afɔrbɔ reba EWURADZE fie no ndze dɛ
column6: Hom mfa ndaase mma dɔm EWURADZE
column9: Na mebɛma asaase no asan ayɛ prɔmprɔm dɛ asɔpɔn no

column2: "Mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE se nye yi: Bea yi a ɔabɔ a nyimpa na abowa biara nnyi
column4: ɔbɛyɛ tsenabea bio ama nguanhwɛfo a wɔbɛma hɔn nguan ebutubutuw hɔ."

column6: na mbeambea a etwa Jerusalɛm ho ehyia
column8: na nguankuw bodua nyia ɔkan hɔn no nsa ase etwa mu bio

column5: mebɛma asɛmpa no a mekaa no Israel fifo ho na Juda fifo ho no aba mu."

column4: nna mebɛma ɔtsenenee Odubaa afefɛw ama David; na ɔayɛ atsɛmbu na tsenenee wɔ asaase no do."

column2: "Nda no mu na Jerusalɛm atsena ase dwudwoodwo: na iyi nye dzin a wɔdze bɛfrɛ no
"Na mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi: Ɔbarimba a ɔbɛtsena Israel fie akɔngua do ɔrommbɔ David;"

column4: na ɔabɔ okum afɔr daapem wɔ m'enyim no

column5: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi: Sɛ hom botum ato m'adzekyee ahyɛmu na m'adzesaa ahyɛmu
column6: ma adzekyee na adzesaa remmba bio wɔ n'aber mu a;"

column2: "ɔnodze na wɔbɔto menye m'akowaa David ntamu ahyɛmu no
column3: ma onnkenya ɔbabanyin a ɔbɛtsena n'akɔngua do edzi hen; na ɔnye Levifo asɔfo a wɔsom me no."
eso wonnsusu mpoano anhwea no; dɛmara na mebɛma m'akowaa David asefo
column4: na Levifo a wɔsom me no wɔadɔr."

column5: "Ana enndwen dza ɔman yi aka no ho
column7: Mbusu ebien a EWURADZE saan mu yii hɔn no
column8: wɔatow hɔn akyen? Mbrɛ wobu me man enyimtsia nye yi
column9: dɛ wɔnnyɛ hɔn enyi do dɛ ɔman bio."

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi: Sɛ m'adzekyee na adzesaa ahyɛmu no enngyina a
column3: sɛ mannhyɛ ɔsor na asaase ahyɛdze no a;"

column4: dɛ mennkɛfa n'asefo mu bi ma woeedzi Abraham
column6: na Jakob asefo do mpanyin: na mebɛma hɔn ndɔmmumfo asan
